config.control-panel-key.name: Control Panel Key
config.control-panel-key.description: Press this key when within range of a machine to open the machine control panel.
config.machine-select-key.name: Machine Select Key
config.machine-select-key.description: Press this key to open a selection menu for all machines in the game.
config.default-page.name: Default Page
config.default-page.description: Page of control panel to display by default.
config.open-machine-select-menu.name: Open Machine Select Menu
rule-list.title: Machine: {{name}}
rule-list.footer-note: Only the host can change machine settings.
skip-reason.rules: Input rejected due to disabled machine rules.
